bibl.title: A Fragment of Old Comedy: P. Columbia inv. 430.
bibl.note: Purchased by H.I. Bell in 1926-7. Provenance unknown, final decades of the fourth or beginning of the fifth century CE. The fragment may derive from an unidentified Old Comedy about a demagogue. Digital images of the papyrus are available on the APIS website.
bibl.seg: BARRENECHEA Francisco, A Fragment of Old Comedy: P. Columbia inv. 430.

Purchased by H.I. Bell in 1926-7. Provenance unknown, final decades of the fourth or beginning of the fifth century CE. The fragment may derive from an unidentified Old Comedy about a demagogue. Digital images of the papyrus are available on the APIS website.
